column2: an A.M. Eatery////Annoyance 2 - It's December and it cold outside
column3: however add some heating lamps outside and BOOM
column4: you've just added customers to your 12 or so tables OUTSIDE which oleviates the overcrowding! I would have been more than happy to take a table outside if there were heaters. All tables were empty outside which caused mass crowding inside and longer waits.
